title: Little Warm Pillow - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Shapeshifters   Short Story
author: 蒙面小番茄
description: He is the cutest little throw pillow in the store, wearing a pure sky blue fleece jacket on his chubby body. Every customer who entered the store couldn’t help but reach out and squeeze him, but no customer was willing to buy him, just because his price was too expensive.>
